001
002package com.commercetools.money;
003
004import java.text.MessageFormat;
005import java.util.ServiceLoader;
006
007public class MonetarySupplier {
008    private static final MonetaryProvider MONETARY_PROVIDER;
009
010    static {
011        MONETARY_PROVIDER = of();
012    }
013
014    public static MonetaryProvider instance() {
015        return MONETARY_PROVIDER;
016    }
017
018    public static MonetaryProvider of() {
019        final ServiceLoader<MonetaryProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(MonetaryProvider.class,
020            MonetaryProvider.class.getClassLoader());
021        MonetaryProvider provider = null;
022        try {
023            provider = loader.iterator().next();
024        }
025        catch (Throwable ignored) {
026        }
027
028        if (provider == null) {
029            final String s = MessageFormat.format("No {0} found. A service locator definition is missing or erroneous.",
030                MonetaryProvider.class.getCanonicalName());
031            throw new NoClassDefFoundError(s);
032        }
033        return provider;
034    }
035}
